notes.body: We continue to investigate the ongoing issues with several Slack features. We'll follow up when we have more information or in 30 minutes. Thanks for bearing with us.
We're still investigating the ongoing issues with several Slack features. There's no additional information to share just yet, but we'll follow up in 30 minutes. Thanks for bearing with us.

Some users are experiencing issues with several Slack functions currently, including Huddles, Email Integrations, and File Uploads. We are currently investigating and will provide an update in 30 minutes.
